Dear Bonny Doon Community,
I am writing this message while some staff have received orders for evacuation from their homes because of fires that are spreading in our community. Many students, staff and families are spending time preparing to evacuate as a result of the fires in our immediate area. With all that our community has gone through in the last few months, it feels inconceivable to find that we are facing yet another extreme moment. Our community is demonstrably resilient and BDUESD is committed to supporting all of our students, staff and families.

If you or your family are impacted directly by the fire, we ask that you follow all evacuation orders to ensure that you and your loved ones remain safe. When you are able, please contact us to update us about your situation and what needs you may have.

Our hearts go out to everyone in our school community who is impacted by this fire. We will continue to support one another through these difficult and unprecedented times.

With deep appreciation,
Mike Heffner
Superintendent
